instruction: Describe the impact of the internet on daily life.
output: The internet has had a dramatic impact on everyday life. It has allowed for greater communication and collaboration through email, instant messaging and other forms of digital communication platforms. It has enabled people to connect with others more easily and quickly than ever before, fostering global communities and providing opportunities for relationships to be formed and strengthened. The internet has also made accessing information easier and faster than ever before, allowing people to learn quickly and stay up to date with current events. Finally, the internet has made commerce more accessible and efficient, with online shopping and commerce platforms making it easier to buy and sell goods and services, while online payment methods have revolutionized how money is digital exchanged.
